name: Kroger VIP Connector
description: Connector that generates Excel files sent via email to customers for upload to Kroger. Uses category-specific Excel templates bundled into a zip file, with automated daily target schema generation. Integrates with 1WorldSync for data synchronization.

name: Vendor Item Portal (Kroger)
description: Kroger's vendor item portal system where suppliers upload product information via Excel templates. The con-kroger-vip connector generates these Excel files for Salsify customers to upload to Kroger VIP.

name: Kroger VIP Queue Name
description: The RabbitMQ queue name used by the Kroger VIP connector service for processing publication requests.
